title: War of the Three Henries
summary: The War of the Three Henries was a French Civil War fought between the &{Catholic League} led by Henry of Guise, the Huguenots led by Henry of Navarre, and the Catholic Valois Crown led by Henry III. The war ended with the assassination of Henry of Guise and Henry III, leaving Henry of Navarre as the only remaining Henry. He converted to Catholicism and became King Henry IV of France.
